name: Hammer Whitsundays Sailing Tour
description: Step aboard Hammer, a true race-bred maxi yacht, and launch into a high-energy sailing experience unlike any other. With only 23 guests onboard, every moment is personal, immersive, and exhilarating. Experience the thrill of sailing across the Whitsundays, exploring the world-famous Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet Lookout. Perfect for adventure seekers and those looking to enjoy the beauty of the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park in a unique and intimate setting.
includes:
All meals – daily breakfast, morning tea, lunch, afternoon snacks, dinner & dessert
Beverages – tea, coffee, hot chocolate & filtered water
Snorkelling equipment (mask, snorkel & wetsuit)
Comfortable bedding with a pillow, bed linen, and a fan
All Marine Park fees
Hot freshwater showers onboard
Three experienced and passionate crew members
highlights:
Sail on an ex-racing maxi yacht
Explore Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet Lookout
Snorkel at up to 3 fringing island reef locations
Enjoy spacious open decks for sunbathing and socialising
Dorm-style accommodation with fans and linen
BYO alcohol welcome (no glass or red wine)
Rain & sunshades, hammocks, yoga mats available
price_tiers: Adult (until 31 Dec 2025): A$669 | Adult (from 1 Jan 2026): A$699
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- Wake up to a yummy breakfast as you cruise to Tongue Bay.
- Take a scenic bushwalk to Hill Inlet Lookout for breathtaking views.
- Spend 3 hours relaxing on Whitehaven Beach.
- Lunch is served back on board.
- Sail to two handpicked snorkel destinations.
- Head to another beach location for sunset snacks before overnight anchorage.
**Day 2:**
- Enjoy the morning in Airlie.
- Head back to your accommodation and freshen up.
- Join your new friends for an after-party with reserved table, meal deals, and drink discounts.
menu:
**Afternoon snack:** Sunset platter with cheese, crudités, crackers & dips
**Dinner:** Roast chicken and stuffing with creamy mashed potato, steamed vegetables, gravy, and stone-baked bread
ideal_for: Adventure seekers and those looking to experience the beauty of the Whitsundays in an intimate and thrilling sailing adventure.
important_information: ['Suitable for ages 18+', 'All guests must be fit and able to move freely about a boat unassisted.', 'We provide flotation devices, risk assessments, and nearby tender support at snorkel spots.', 'Accommodation on all Prosail vessels is made up of single and double beds in open shared dorm style cabins/sections below deck.']
what_to_bring: ['Soft bag only (no wheels)', 'Swimwear', 'Towel', 'Sunscreen', 'Sunglasses', 'Hat', 'Light shoes', 'Sweater', 'Spray jacket', 'Personal toiletries']
whats_extra: ['BYO alcohol welcome (no glass or red wine)', 'Prices do not include airfares or transfers to and from the marina, accommodation pre or post tour or extras.', 'No large bags or suitcases will be accepted on-board. Luggage can be stored at most accommodation locations in Airlie Beach.']
cancellation_policy: {'Direct Bookings': 'Cancellations made 7 days or less prior to departure will result in complete forfeiture of the full price. Cancellations made 8 days or more prior to departure will incur a $50 per person admin & booking fee. Any date changes can be accepted without a fee up to 8 days prior to departure. Please note that the cancellation policy will always be calculated from original departure date. Failure to arrive for a departure will result in full forfeit of the full price.', 'Third Party Booking Site & Travel Agent Bookings': 'Cancellations made 7 days or less prior to departure will result in complete forfeiture of the full price. Cancellations made 8 days or more before departure may incur fees through your travel agent or third party booking site. Please contact them for more information. Any date changes can be accepted without a fee up to 8 days prior to departure. Please note that the cancellation policy will always be calculated from original departure date. Failure to arrive for a departure will result in full forfeit of the full price.'}

name: Broomstick Whitsundays – Sailing Tour
description: Set sail on Broomstick, a high-performance racing yacht turned adventure tour, for 2 unforgettable nights exploring Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet, and the best snorkel spots in the Whitsundays. Experience the thrill of sailing on an ex-racing maxi yacht with spacious decks perfect for sunbathing and socializing. Ideal for adventure seekers and sailing enthusiasts, this tour offers a unique blend of excitement and relaxation, with opportunities to snorkel, enjoy stunning sunsets, and connect with fellow travelers.
includes:
All meals – daily breakfast, morning tea, lunch, afternoon snacks, dinner & dessert
Beverages – tea, coffee, hot chocolate & filtered water (BYO alcohol & other beverages – no glass bottles please)
Snorkelling equipment (mask, snorkel & wetsuit)
Comfortable bedding with a pillow, bed linen, and a fan
All Marine Park fees
Three experienced and passionate crew members (skipper and two deckhands/hosts)
highlights:
Sail on an ex-racing maxi yacht
Explore Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet Lookout
Snorkel at up to 3 fringing island reef locations
Enjoy hot freshwater showers onboard
Spacious open decks for sunbathing and socializing
Rain & sunshades, hammocks, yoga mats available
BYO alcohol welcome (no glass or red wine)
price_tiers: Adult (until 31 Dec 2025): A$669 | Adult (from 1 Jan 2026): A$699
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- Depart from Coral Sea Marina
- Sail to Tongue Bay
- Bushwalk to Hill Inlet Lookout
- Spend 3 hours on Whitehaven Beach
- Lunch onboard
- Snorkel at two handpicked destinations
- Enjoy sunset snacks at a beach location
**Day 2:**
- Breakfast onboard
- Sail to additional snorkel spots
- Return to Coral Sea Marina
- Enjoy an after-party with meal deals and drink discounts
menu:
**Afternoon snack:** Sunset platter with cheese, crudités, crackers & dips
**Dinner:** Roast chicken and stuffing with creamy mashed potato, steamed vegetables, gravy, and stone-baked bread
**Evening:** Tea, coffee & hot chocolate with Tim Tams & cookies
ideal_for: Adventure seekers, sailing enthusiasts, and those looking to explore the Whitsundays in a unique and thrilling way
important_information: ['Suitable for ages 18+', 'All guests must be fit and able to move freely about a boat unassisted.', 'We provide flotation devices, risk assessments, and nearby tender support at snorkel spots.']
what_to_bring: ['Soft bag only (no wheels)', 'Swimwear', 'Towel', 'Sunscreen', 'Sunglasses', 'Hat', 'Light shoes', 'Sweater', 'Spray jacket', 'Personal toiletries']
whats_extra: ['BYO alcohol welcome (no glass or red wine)', 'Prices do not include airfares or transfers to and from the marina, accommodation pre or post tour or extras.', 'No large bags or suitcases will be accepted on-board. Luggage can be stored at most accommodation locations in Airlie Beach.']
cancellation_policy: ['Cancellations made 7 days or less prior to departure will result in complete forfeiture of the full price.', 'Cancellations made 8 days or more prior to departure will incur a $50 per person admin & booking fee.', 'Any date changes can be accepted without a fee up to 8 days prior to departure.', 'Failure to arrive for a departure will result in full forfeit of the full price.']

name: Condor Whitsundays Sailing Tour
description: Embark on the ultimate sailing adventure aboard Condor, an ex-racing maxi yacht offering thrilling liveaboard trips around the Whitsundays. Experience the excitement of sailing a performance-built yacht with spacious open decks perfect for sunbathing and socializing. This tour is ideal for adults seeking adventure, stunning views, and the camaraderie of fellow travelers. Enjoy unforgettable moments at world-famous locations like Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet Lookout, complemented by delicious meals and the chance to snorkel at pristine reef sites.
includes:
All meals – daily breakfast, morning tea, lunch, afternoon snacks, dinner & dessert
Beverages – tea, coffee, hot chocolate & filtered water
Snorkelling equipment (mask, snorkel & wetsuit)
Comfortable bedding with a pillow, bed linen, and a fan
All Marine Park fees
Hot freshwater showers onboard
Three experienced crew members (skipper and two deckhands/hosts)

Visit world-famous Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet Lookout
Snorkel at up to 3 fringing island reef locations
Spacious open decks for sunbathing and socializing
Dorm-style accommodation with fans and linen
BYO alcohol welcome (no glass or red wine)
Enjoy sunset snacks and an after-party in Airlie

**Day 2:**

- Continue exploring the Whitsunday Islands
- Return to Airlie Beach for an after-party
